__e: Because I told my mom I missed Cameron, and made her cry.
I heard a shot, I ran in, and there was poor Mr. Cameron, and that right pretty wife of his.
Our Letter to David Cameron, 11 May, 2011
Mrs. Cameron is in no condition to testify at the present time.
Come, Mistress Cameron, this is no place for you.
You will not believe it, but the child has walked.
I ask you if Mrs. Cameron is present in this court.
Mr. Cameron's on the phone right now. Would you wait a minute, please?
- Sorry, General. - Mr. Cameron is your assistant...
- Hang on - Cameron, it's my dad
